ygData.subject: Re: PLEASE!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I have a problem with this whole e-mail, First I thought the whole point of this game is to group and not solo.  That is what attracted me to this game.
ygData.messageBody:
Well I have a problem with this whole e-mail, First I thought the whole point
of this game is to group and not solo. That is what attracted me to this
game. I'm tired of playing Might and Magic and other such RPG's. What your
saying is everyone is whinning because they feel useless in a group. Well
grouping is the whole point to this game. Second I wanna kill red mobs, it's
much more satisfying killing something such higher level than your group.
Now no one wants a wizard because they know you're useless when it comes to
mobs 5 or 6 levels ahead of you. Your point about coming back later when
your higher level is just stupid. If all other classes can group and kill a
red mob why can't you? The wizard is left in the cold. I don't think either
that anyone wants to jump right in and melee, I sure as hell don't. But i
want to be effective in a group with my spells, that's all I want. Sorry if
I sound like an ass but it pisses me off when people are so satisfied with
our class when you see all the other classes get improvements. I would love
to start a petition to make our class better if everyone is for it!

Parthon lvl 12 Erudite
